logic.roles

Class RoleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.roles.RoleFactory

  • public class RoleFactory
extends Object
    A class for creating various roles for projects, tasks and job.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RoleFactory(Configuration configuration)
      Initializes the configuration variable with the passed Configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Leader createLeader(User user, Project project)
      Creates a new leader role to the project with the given user account.
      Member createMember(User user, Project project)
      Creates a new member role to the project with the given user account.
      Supervisor createSupervisor(User user, Task task)
      Creates a new Supervisor to the task with the given user account.
      Worker createWorker(User user, Task task)
      Creates a new Worker role to the task with the given user account.

        public Leader createLeader(User user,
                           Project project)
        Creates a new leader role to the project with the given user account.
        Parameters:
        user - User account to which the leader role is associated with
        project - Project to which the new leader is added to.
        Returns:
        Leader containing associations to user and project.
